dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
N. Pow
I. Serban
J. Pineau
dcterms:description: A multi-turn based dialog corpus constructed from Ubuntu chat logs, used to receive technical support for Ubuntu-related problems. The dataset contains dialog context-response pairs extracted from real chat logs, with named entities replaced by corresponding tags.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus (UDC)
